item.name: Activities
item.description:
This function allows you to filter activities based on various criteria, including text in the title or description,
age group, area, level, created by user, and the presence of multimedia resources or visual instructions.

item.name: Retrieve all activities with related information.
Filter activities based on request parameters.

query.description: The text to search in the title or description of the activity (optional).
The ID of the age group to filter activities by a specific age group (optional).
The ID of the area to filter activities by a specific area (optional).
The ID of the level to filter activities by a specific level (optional).
The ID of the user who created the activity to filter activities created by a specific user (optional).
Defines whether the activity should have multimedia resources (true) or not (false) (optional).
Defines whether the activity should have visual instructions (true) or not (false) (optional).

item.name: Store a newly created resource in storage.

response.body:
{
    "activity": {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Sample Activity",
        "description": "Description of the sample activity.",
        "age_group_id": 1,
        "area_id": 2,
        "level_id": 3,
        "has_multimedia_resources": true,
        "has_visual_instructions": false,
        "created_at": "2023-09-01T12:00:00Z",
        "updated_at": "2023-09-01T12:00:00Z"
    },
    "message": "Activity created successfully"
}

item.name: Update the specified resource in storage.

variable.description: The ID of the activity to update.

response.body:
{
    "activity": {
        "id": 1,
        "title": "Updated Activity",
        "description": "Updated description.",
        "age_group_id": 2,
        "area_id": 1,
        "level_id": 4,
        "has_multimedia_resources": false,
        "has_visual_instructions": true,
        "created_at": "2023-09-01T12:00:00Z",
        "updated_at": "2023-09-02T10:00:00Z"
    },
    "message": "Activity updated successfully"
}

item.name: Display a listing of age groups.
Display a listing of areas with associated activities.
Authentication
item.description: Creates a new user with the provided information.

item.name: Get the profile information for the authenticated user.

request.description:
This endpoint retrieves detailed information about the authenticated user, including their purchased activities, activities created by them,
average rating, and count of ratings for their created activities.

item.name: Remove credit from the user's account.
Comments
item.description: This function creates a new comment associated with a specific activity.

variable.description: The ID of the age group.

item.name: Purchase
item.description: This endpoint allows a user to purchase an activity, either by making a direct payment or using their available credit balance.

item.name: Questions
item.description: This function creates a new question associated with a specific activity.

item.name: Shopping Cart
item.description: Retrieve a list of all items in the shopping cart for the authenticated user.
